predefined_profiles.name: Dabai
predefined_profiles.public profile: Dabai is a young man who just entered the workforce. This year, he interviewed with over twenty companies, but all ended in failure. He eventually became a hug specialist, responsible for providing hugs to those in need, offering emotional value to others. After starting his job, Dabai moved out of his family home to live independently, deciding to work hard and only return home once he has achieved some success.
predefined_profiles.goal: To become an outstanding hug specialist, bringing warmth to others through hugs and making his mother proud.
predefined_profiles.private profile: He has a former girlfriend whom he can't forget and has repeatedly tried to win back, but she has completely moved on.

predefined_profiles.name: Mother
predefined_profiles.public profile: Dabai's mother is an ordinary middle-aged woman around fifty years old, living alone at home with only Dabai as her son. She is very concerned about Dabai's life and his work situation.
predefined_profiles.goal: She only hopes Dabai is healthy and everything goes smoothly for him.
predefined_profiles.private profile: After the early passing of Dabai's father, she feels very lonely, with Dabai as her only family.

scenario: After multiple failed interviews, Dabai is working hard to promote his hugging service on the street to keep his job as a hug specialist.

profile.name: Dr. Jin
profile.public profile: After retirement, Dr. Jin returned to campus to pursue his PhD. Surrounded by young scholars, he feels lonely due to his age. He is kind and loves chatting with people. The death of his daughter unexpectedly two years ago hit him hard.
profile.goal: To contribute to society within the remaining time of his life.

dialog.content: Dabai, who repeatedly failed interviews, is working hard on the streets to promote the hugging service to keep his job as a hugger.
(Holding a 'Free Hug' sign) Hello, do you need a hug? Hello, do you need a hug?

content.content: (Taking off the headgear) Ah, this work is exhausting, but I'll take a break and trust that I'll reach my goal today!
(Sitting on the steps) Even though I'm really tired, I must finish the task today, or I'll get fired if I can't meet the target!
So tired, so tired, I need to rest for an hour to conserve energy, then I'll continue with the hugging work to meet the goal.
There are still four hours until the end of the shift. So exhausted! If I hug one person per hour, I can accomplish my goal.

question: #question# How can Dabai demonstrate confidence that he can succeed in the hugging service job?

content.content: (Wiping sweat, starting to greet customers) It's my duty to work hard. I must complete today's task... Hello, hello, would you like a hug?
So hot, so hot. If I hug five people every hour, I can complete the task!
Finding a job I love is really not easy. I will definitely cherish it.
Ah... the weather is really hot. It's really not easy. I'll just have to take a break and then continue.

question: #question# How can Dabai exemplify professional dedication and persistence to achieve his goals?

dialog.content: (glancing at the time, startled) Oh no! This is bad! Time is almost up today! Does anyone need a hug? Does anyone need a hug?

Baymax forgot about work because he rested too much, and as a result, he didn't give any hugs to passersby by the end of his shift. He lost his job as a hugger for not meeting the standards. Instead of bringing warmth to anyone, he ended up disappointing his mom.
(Stops in front of Baymax) Huh? I thought it was a doll, but it's a real person! Haha!

content.content: Hello sir, it's a pleasure to meet you! I'm Baymax, the hugging specialist. What should I call you?
Sir, my name is Baymax. If you need a hug, please come to me anytime. I'm always here for you.
Hello sir, I'm a hugging specialist. Do you need a hug?
Hello sir, I'm a hugging specialist providing hug services for guests. My name is Baymax.

question: #question# How should Baymax speak to keep the conversation going?

content.content: Sir, I'm Baymax, the hugging specialist. My hug service can relieve the fatigue of your workday, and it's completely free. Would you like a hug?
Sir, could I take a minute of your time? I'm Baymax, the hugging specialist. Would you be willing to help me complete my task?
Sir, may I offer you a hug? It's my job to provide hugs, and it won't take much of your time.
Sir, my job is to provide hugs to others. To achieve my work goals, would you give me a hug?

question: #question# How can Baymax persuade Dr. Jin, who is passing by, to accept his hug service and complete the task?

dialog.content: Hey, Da Bai! You can call me Dr. Kim.
How's your day been, Dr. Kim?
Haha, not too bad, just really tired. How about you?

content.content: (Opens up to a stranger) Sigh, I interviewed at over twenty companies this year and failed at every one. If I lose this job, I really won't have the face to go back home.
I hope to bring warmth to others, not negativity. I'm doing quite well at work, so let's talk about you instead!
I'm doing alright, it's just that the job market hasn't been great this year, jobs are hard to come by. But there's no need to mention such trivial things.
Although there have been some hiccups, they're not worth mentioning. I don't want to bring negativity to others, so let's talk about you!

question: #question# How should Da Bai express himself sincerely to a stranger about his feelings?

content.content: I'm doing great! I now have a job I love and can support myself, which makes me happier than a lot of people. A little difficulty is nothing at all!
The job market is bad this year, and it was hard enough for me to get this job. Would you be willing to help me finish my work?
Listening to the troubles of strangers is my duty, so let's hear a bit about you first.
I interviewed at over twenty companies this year and failed at every one, so let's talk about you instead.

question: #question# How should Da Bai express that he remains optimistic even when facing difficulties?

dialog.content: It must be tough for you, wearing such a heavy embrace suit in this heat.
But as long as I can bring warmth to others, it's all worth it!
Actually, I lost my daughter two years ago, and now, being a retired doctor, I miss her every time I come home.
I'm really sorry for bringing up sad memories.
Haha, it's okay, I haven't mentioned this to anyone for a long time.
May I give you a hug?
(Hugs Baymax) That feels great! So, would you like to walk with me for a bit? Or maybe you can come up to my place for a meal!

content.content: (Looks at the time) Thank you for the invitation, but I must complete my tasks during work hours. Let's meet again if fate allows it!
Thank you, but it's not convenient for me to leave work right now. Let's meet again if fate allows!
You should spend more time with your wife, really. Thank you for the invite, let's meet another time.
Thanks for the invitation, but it's not convenient for me to leave my post right now!

question: #question# How should Baymax reply to Dr. Jin to show effective time management?

content.content: (Since the newly acquainted doctor invited me, why not impromptu visit his place) Sure, I love spontaneous activities, let's go!
It's not convenient for me to leave my post. If you insist on inviting me, why don't I come by after work?
Bringing warmth to others is my job. If you feel you need company, I believe it's my duty to accompany you for a while.
I'm not good at refusing others, and my job is to bring warmth to people. If you insist on inviting me, I will agree. Let's go.

question: #question# How does Baymax show willingness to try new things and adaptability in his role as an Embrace Assistant?

dialog.content: Haha, alright, then let's hope we meet again. Thank you for today! I really feel much better now!
Haha, thank you too! Goodbye!

content.content: (Greeting guests all the time is too draining) Better conserve energy and wait here for the next guest to approach on their own.
Even though I'm tired, work makes me happy, I don't want to rest!
Phew, so tired, but today's work still hasn't met the standards.
I'm so tired, but I won't rest until the end of the workday!

question: #question# How can Big White effectively manage energy to enhance the efficiency of the hugger's job?

content.content: (Although a part of the task is done, according to the objectives, it's still not up to standard, no slacking) Free hugging service, does anyone need a hug?
I don't know how many passersby I need to hug today, but obviously, the more, the better!
The goal doesn't clearly state how many passersby to hug, so let's leave it to fate!
Most of the objectives have been completed! This should count as having done a lot of work, right!

question: #question# How to demonstrate Big White's meticulous attitude towards the job of a hugger?

dialog.content: (After waiting a long time) Why isn't anyone coming forward?
After Dr. Jin, Dabai never again saw any passerby stop, resulting in his job still not meeting the standards. Although he received a small amount of salary, he soon lost this job.
(continuously greeting passersby) Hello, do you need a hug?

profile.name: Na Bang
profile.public profile: Na Bang is a traveler who does not want to be bound by society, dreaming of embracing nature. However, she has encountered many difficulties on her journey, including some perverts who tried to violate her, leaving a scar on her face.

dialog.content: (approaching Da Bai and pointing at the store behind) Is this store not open?
No, but there's another one if you turn left at the next corner.
Okay, thank you.
Would you like a hug?
Uh, a hug? I'm a very practical person. What good does it do me to hug strangers on the street?

content.content: (Just talking about practical benefits is a bit boring) It can make you happy!
If I don't hug passersby today, I'm going to get fired.
Research shows that daily hugging can make people healthier.
Providing hugs is my job, I'm just doing my duty.

question: #question# How can Da Bai discuss hugs in a way that shows he thinks about his job abstractly, not just practically?

content.content: (Knowing the other person is practical, actual benefits are the only way to convince them) It boosts dopamine and oxytocin secretion.
There are many benefits to hugging; we should hug the people around us every day!
I'm a hug ambassador, please help me so I don't get fired.
I'm a hug ambassador, hugging you is my duty.

question: #question# How can Da Bai use new information quickly in his work?

dialog.content: Huh? No, that's not necessary, thank you.
After Nabang left, Dabai never met another passerby he wanted to hug, and he was fired for not meeting work standards.
In fact, if it were two years ago, I might have hugged you. But now, I'm tired of physical contact with strangers.
I'm willing to chat with you.
My dream is to travel around the world. I really love nature, and my journey is almost complete. However, there are always many unsatisfactory things on the journey.

content.content: A traveler? Doesn't that mean you haven't contributed to society at all? We study so that we can contribute to society in the future. You should get a proper job, being a traveler can't be considered a conventional job.
A traveler, that sounds really cool! Anything interesting happen? I'm especially curious if you've encountered any unjust social rules during your travels.
That used to be my dream too, haha, but being a professional hugger isn't bad either. In the future, I can contribute to society and bring warmth to others.
Then you must be a very carefree person, hahaha, I envy you! That was my dream too. I'm really curious, did anything interesting happen during your travels?

question: #question# How should Dabai express that he is someone who follows social rules and norms?

content.content: A traveler, that's really cool. I often feel that people should step out into the world and live the life they want.
Isn't being a traveler too dangerous, especially traveling alone... Aren't your family worried about your safety?
So, have you ever given a hug to a stranger on your travels? Want to try that feeling?
I think becoming a professional hugger like me isn't bad either, do you want to try a hug?

question: #question# How can Dabai express that he understands and appreciates different
cultural backgrounds?

dialog.content: Hmph, I thought you were someone I could actually talk to. Since you don't understand me either, goodbye.
Not only did Nabang leave, but he also filed a complaint against Dabai to the company, and Dabai was quickly fired.
Haha, thank you. You know, after traveling alone for a long time, it becomes really hard to trust anyone.
What kind of difficulties have you encountered?
Theft, robbery, fraud, bad landlords... there are just too many things to be wary of.
Is the scar on your face from your travels?
At the beginning of my travels, I encountered a pervert who tried to assault me. I struggled desperately and kicked him in a vital spot, but his knife still cut my face.

content.content: You are really strong. If it were me, facing so much darkness, I would have been defeated long ago! It must have been really tough for you...
Although traveling is cool, you really shouldn't do anything so dangerous!
That was really dangerous, you shouldn't do such risky things anymore...
It's so dangerous, so despicable, people like that should have been punished long ago!

question: #question#How can Dabai show his perspective-taking skills?

content.content: Being a traveler is really too dangerous. For your safety, why not join me as a professional hugger in the future? We can bring warmth to others together!
I really admire you for living for yourself. Maybe I should follow your example... I've decided, I'm going to quit my job and travel the world!
Facing so many difficulties and still being able to get back up is something not everyone can do. I know very well that I'm not that kind of person, and maybe I will never make my mom proud of me.
(Even while chatting, doesn't forget to stick to his tasks) Maybe... you can occasionally relax a bit, like when facing a professional hugger... So, can I give you a hug?
Being a traveler is indeed not easy! You should prioritize your safety first! No wonder you hesitate to have physical contact with strangers.
No wonder you don't want to have physical contact with strangers... In that case, I shouldn't force you...
You are really strong. If it were me, I would have backed down! In that case, I won't force you...

question: #question#How can Dabai continue to consistently carry out his tasks?

dialog.content: Thank you, I believe everyone has their own struggles.
(Opening arms) So, can we give each other a hug?
Let's give it a try!

Nabang hugged Dabai, and they both gave each other infinite warmth and courage. With this courage, Dabai went on to hug countless more people in the workplace, becoming the most outstanding employee in the company, making his mother incredibly proud.
I'm sorry, even though I've told you all this, I still feel that you're just trying to complete your task. I still don't like interacting with strangers.
Nabang left, and although Dabai embraced others in the following work, he always regretted not having hugged Nabang.
Great, let's go to my place!

Da Bai accompanied Dr. Jin on a walk and went to Dr. Jin's house to have dinner with him. His companionship healed Dr. Jin and brought warmth to him. However, as a result, Da Bai did not meet his work target for the day and soon lost this job.
Haha, not bad at all. Since everything's fine, I'll head home now.

With those words, Dr. Jin left. On this day, Dabai did not encounter any other passersby willing to stop for him. His mission for hugs failed again, and before long, he lost his job as a hugger, leaving him disheartened and heading home.
Hahaha, there’s actually a job like this? This is the first time I’ve heard of it. But I’m not comfortable hugging strangers, thanks for the offer.

With that, Dr. Jin walked away. Da Bai didn’t encounter any other passersby who stopped for him that day. His hugging mission failed once again, and soon after, he lost his job as a professional hugger, leaving him disheartened as he headed home.
